title: 가정법 도치 종합
description: Had I ~, Were I to ~, Should I ~를 모두 사용하여 말하는 연습을 합니다.
examples: Had I known about the meeting, I would have attended it.
Were I to receive the promotion, I would relocate to the new office.
Should you need any assistance, please don't hesitate to contact me.
learning_points: 다양한 형태의 가정법 도치 구문 종합적 활용

sentences.kr: 만약 내가 그 회의에 대해 알았다면, 참석했을 것이다.
sentences.en: Had I known about the meeting, I would have attended it.

sentences.kr: 만약 내가 승진을 받는다면, 새 사무실로 이전할 것이다.
sentences.en: Were I to receive the promotion, I would relocate to the new office.

sentences.kr: 만약 당신이 도움이 필요하다면, 주저하지 말고 연락해 주세요.
sentences.en: Should you need any assistance, please don't hesitate to contact me.

sentences.kr: 만약 그가 더 일찍 떠났다면, 교통체증을 피했을 것이다.
sentences.en: Had he left earlier, he would have avoided the traffic jam.

sentences.kr: 만약 시장 상황이 개선된다면, 우리는 투자를 확대할 것이다.
sentences.en: Were the market conditions to improve, we would expand our investments.

sentences.kr: 만약 문제가 발생한다면, 즉시 팀장에게 보고해야 합니다.
sentences.en: Should any problems arise, you must report them to the team leader immediately.

sentences.kr: 만약 그들이 계획을 제대로 세웠다면, 이런 혼란을 겪지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.en: Had they planned properly, they wouldn't have experienced this confusion.

sentences.kr: 만약 새로운 기술이 도입된다면, 생산성이 크게 향상될 것이다.
sentences.en: Were new technology to be introduced, productivity would improve significantly.
